sentences.en: Crudely or irregularly fashioned verse , often of a humorous or burlesque nature.
sentences.cn: 打油诗多属幽默滑稽之作粗劣或无章法的诗.

sentences.en: Crudely programming children to make the right responses.
sentences.cn: 很粗略地训练孩子们自发地做出正确的反应.

sentences.en: For cities, the law can be crudely expressed as the " rank - size rule "
sentences.cn: 对城市来说, 这个法律可以被笼统地表达为 “ 秩规模规则 ”

sentences.en: He did not scruple to talk crudely either.
sentences.cn: 年青人毫无拘束的还加上许多粗话蠢话.

sentences.en: He didn't put it quite as crudely as that.
sentences.cn: 他表述得并没那么拙劣.

sentences.en: In some places maps are scarce and are often crudely produced.
sentences.cn: 在一些地区,地图是很稀少的,通常都是被粗糙的制造.

sentences.en: In some places maps are scarce, and are often crudely produced.
sentences.cn: 有些地方很少有地图，而且通常绘制得都很粗糙。

sentences.en: Now I really know that why my mother treat me so crudely!
sentences.cn: 我现在终于知道我的母亲为什么会那么狠心的对我了!

sentences.en: The adult characters seemed too crudely drawn; the hopes and dreams of the fathers – and one assumes, the mothers – too easily dismissed.
sentences.cn: 成年人的角色塑造的太过粗糙，父亲们抑或是母亲们的希望和梦想太过轻易地被排斥。

sentences.en: The donors can be split — a little crudely — into two groups.
sentences.cn: 捐献者可以大致分为两组。

sentences.en: The skull - and - crossbones crudely carved on the first tombstones was replaced by a winged cherub.
sentences.cn: 最初粗糙地刻在墓碑上的骷髅与 交叉 的大腿骨图形,已为带翅膀的天使所代替.

sentences.en: This is a crudely built house.
This man speaks crudely, and doesn't look like a decent man.
sentences.cn: 这个人满口猥词, 一看就不是个好人!

sentences.en: To put it crudely, nobody really gives a toss about this any more.
sentences.cn: 说难听的，没人会真的再在乎这种事了。

sentences.en: While you all do things elegantly, I do things crudely.
sentences.cn: 好吧,你们都是来“雅”的, 我来点儿“俗”的.

words.tran_cn: 粗糙的；天然的，未加工的；粗鲁的
天然的状态；生硬；未成熟
粗糙地；天然地；粗鲁地；不成熟地

trans.tran_cn: 照自然状态，不成熟地，粗杂地
